message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about we try $105?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to walking away, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $102?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $102, but I'm still interested in the product. I'd like to make a final counteroffer of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I've already given a lot, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to have to pass on your offer and consider other options.
